channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-24427|2024-08-02T10:56:04.151Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20oauth%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket OAuth Plugin 0.12 and earlier does not invalidate the previous session on login.

item.title: CVE-2023-4302|2024-08-02T07:24:04.695Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fortify%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Fortify Plugin 22.1.38 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-30516|2024-08-02T14:28:51.096Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20image%20tag%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Image Tag Parameter Plugin 2.0 improperly introduces an option to opt out of SSL/TLS certificate validation when connecting to Docker registries, resulting in job configurations using Image Tag Parameters that were created before 2.0 having SSL/TLS certificate validation disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2023-37943|2024-08-02T17:23:27.749Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20active%20directory%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Active Directory Plugin 2.30 and earlier ignores the "Require TLS" and "StartTls" options and always performs the connection test to Active directory unencrypted, allowing attackers able to capture network traffic between the Jenkins controller and Active Directory servers to obtain Active Directory credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-30523|2024-08-02T14:28:51.555Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20portal%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Portal Plugin 0.5 and earlier stores ReportPortal access tokens unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller as part of its configuration where they can be viewed by users with Item/Extended Read permission or access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2023-4303|2024-08-02T07:24:04.501Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fortify%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Fortify Plugin 22.1.38 and earlier does not escape the error message for a form validation method, resulting in an HTML injection vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-32980|2024-08-02T15:32:46.517Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20email%20extension%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Email Extension Plugin allows attackers to make another user stop watching an attacker-specified job.

item.title: CVE-2023-41944|2024-08-02T19:09:49.271Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aws%20codecommit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AWS CodeCommit Trigger Plugin 3.0.12 and earlier does not escape the queue name parameter passed to a form validation URL, when rendering an error message, resulting in an HTML injection vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-40348|2024-08-02T18:31:53.431Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gogs%20plugin
item.description: The webhook endpoint in Jenkins Gogs Plugin 1.0.15 and earlier provides unauthenticated attackers information about the existence of jobs in its output.

item.title: CVE-2023-24438|2024-08-02T10:56:04.155Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jira%20pipeline%20steps%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins JIRA Pipeline Steps Plugin 2.0.165.v8846cf59f3db and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-28669|2024-08-02T13:43:23.665Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jacoco%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins JaCoCo Plugin 3.3.2 and earlier does not escape class and method names shown on the UI, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to control input files for the 'Record JaCoCo coverage report' post-build action.

item.title: CVE-2023-28679|2024-08-02T13:43:23.672Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mashup%20portlets%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Mashup Portlets Plugin 1.1.2 and earlier provides the "Generic JS Portlet" feature that lets a user populate a portlet using a custom JavaScript expression, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by authenticated attackers with Overall/Read permission.

item.title: CVE-2023-24456|2024-08-02T10:56:04.069Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20keycloak%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Keycloak Authentication Plugin 2.3.0 and earlier does not invalidate the previous session on login.

item.title: CVE-2023-37945|2024-08-02T17:23:27.775Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20single%20sign%20on%28sso%29%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin 2.1.0 through 2.3.0 (both inclusive) allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to download a string representation of the current security realm.

item.title: CVE-2023-41931|2024-08-02T19:09:49.187Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20configuration%20history%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin 1227.v7a_79fc4dc01f and earlier does not property sanitize or escape the timestamp value from history entries when rendering a history entry on the history view, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-33002|2024-08-02T15:32:46.656Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20testcomplete%20support%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins TestComplete support Plugin 2.8.1 and earlier does not escape the TestComplete project name, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2023-43502|2024-08-02T19:44:43.340Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 2.4.1 and earlier allows attackers to delete Failure Causes.

item.title: CVE-2023-24455|2024-08-02T10:56:04.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20visualexpert%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins visualexpert Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not restrict the names of files in methods implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to check for the existence of an attacker-specified file path on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2023-39154|2024-08-02T18:02:06.202Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20qualys%20web%20app%20scanning%20connector%20plugin
item.description: Incorrect permission checks in Jenkins Qualys Web App Scanning Connector Plugin 2.0.10 and earlier allow attackers with global Item/Configure permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-24454|2024-08-02T10:56:04.275Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20testquality%20updater%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins TestQuality Updater Plugin 1.3 and earlier stores the TestQuality Updater password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2023-24451|2024-08-02T10:56:04.145Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cisco%20spark%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Cisco Spark Notifier Plugin 1.1.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-27899|2024-08-02T12:23:30.612Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.393 and earlier, LTS 2.375.3 and earlier creates a temporary file in the default temporary directory with the default permissions for newly created files when uploading a plugin for installation, potentially allowing attackers with access to the Jenkins controller file system to read and write the file before it is used, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-24453|2024-08-02T10:56:04.166Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20testquality%20updater%20plugin
item.description: A missing check in Jenkins TestQuality Updater Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified username and password.

item.title: CVE-2023-33003|2024-08-02T15:32:46.591Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20tag%20profiler%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Tag Profiler Plugin 0.2 and earlier allows attackers to reset profiler statistics.

item.title: CVE-2023-24435|2024-08-02T10:56:03.902Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20github%20pull%20request%20builder%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Builder Plugin 1.42.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-30515|2024-08-02T14:28:51.790Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20thycotic%20devops%20secrets%20vault%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Thycotic DevOps Secrets Vault Plugin 1.0.0 and earlier does not properly mask (i.e., replace with asterisks) credentials in the build log when push mode for durable task logging is enabled.

item.title: CVE-2023-40338|2024-08-02T18:31:53.633Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20folders%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Folders Plugin 6.846.v23698686f0f6 and earlier displays an error message that includes an absolute path of a log file when attempting to access the Scan Organization Folder Log if no logs are available, exposing information about the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2023-41936|2024-08-02T19:09:49.355Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20login%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Google Login Plugin 1.7 and earlier uses a non-constant time comparison function when checking whether the provided and expected token are equal, potentially allowing attackers to use statistical methods to obtain a valid token.

item.title: CVE-2023-32981|2024-08-02T15:32:46.622Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20utility%20steps%20plugin
item.description: An arbitrary file write vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline Utility Steps Plugin 2.15.2 and earlier allows attackers able to provide crafted archives as parameters to create or replace arbitrary files on the agent file system with attacker-specified content.

item.title: CVE-2023-33005|2024-08-02T15:32:46.510Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20wso2%20oauth%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins WSO2 Oauth Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not invalidate the previous session on login.

item.title: CVE-2023-39156|2024-08-02T18:02:06.510Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bazaar%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Bazaar Plugin 1.22 and earlier allows attackers to delete previously created Bazaar SCM tags.

item.title: CVE-2023-35143|2024-08-02T16:23:58.988Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20repository%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Repository Server Plugin 1.10 and earlier does not escape the versions of build artifacts on the Build Artifacts As Maven Repository page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to control maven project versions in `pom.xml`.

item.title: CVE-2023-40347|2024-08-02T18:31:53.380Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20artifact%20choicelistprovider%20%28nexus%29%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Artifact ChoiceListProvider (Nexus) Plugin 1.14 and earlier does not set the appropriate context for credentials lookup, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to access and capture credentials they are not entitled to.

item.title: CVE-2023-35145|2024-08-02T16:23:59.354Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sonargraph%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Sonargraph Integration Plugin 5.0.1 and earlier does not escape the file path and the project name for the Log file field form validation, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2023-40337|2024-08-02T18:31:53.670Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20folders%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Folders Plugin 6.846.v23698686f0f6 and earlier allows attackers to copy a view inside a folder.

item.title: CVE-2023-27903|2024-08-02T12:23:30.640Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.393 and earlier, LTS 2.375.3 and earlier creates a temporary file in the default temporary directory with the default permissions for newly created files when uploading a file parameter through the CLI, potentially allowing attackers with access to the Jenkins controller file system to read and write the file before it is used.

item.title: CVE-2023-24440|2024-08-02T10:56:04.130Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jira%20pipeline%20steps%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins JIRA Pipeline Steps Plugin 2.0.165.v8846cf59f3db and earlier transmits the private key in plain text as part of the global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2023-41939|2024-08-02T19:09:49.376Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ssh2%20easy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SSH2 Easy Plugin 1.4 and earlier does not verify that permissions configured to be granted are enabled, potentially allowing users formerly granted (typically optional permissions, like Overall/Manage) to access functionality they're no longer entitled to.

item.title: CVE-2023-40351|2024-08-02T18:31:53.631Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20favorite%20view%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Favorite View Plugin 5.v77a_37f62782d and earlier allows attackers to add or remove views from another user's favorite views tab bar.

item.title: CVE-2023-40350|2024-08-02T18:31:53.683Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker%20swarm%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Docker Swarm Plugin 1.11 and earlier does not escape values returned from Docker before inserting them into the Docker Swarm Dashboard view, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to control responses from Docker.

item.title: CVE-2023-32983|2024-08-02T15:32:46.606Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ansible%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Ansible Plugin 204.v8191fd551eb_f and earlier does not mask extra variables displayed on the configuration form, increasing the potential for attackers to observe and capture them.

item.title: CVE-2023-33007|2024-08-02T15:32:46.595Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20loadcomplete%20support%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins LoadComplete support Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not escape the LoadComplete test name, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2023-24432|2024-08-02T10:56:04.160Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20orka%20by%20macstadium%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Orka by MacStadium Plugin 1.31 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-27901|2024-08-02T12:23:30.540Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.393 and earlier, LTS 2.375.3 and earlier uses the Apache Commons FileUpload library without specifying limits for the number of request parts introduced in version 1.5 for CVE-2023-24998 in org.kohsuke.stapler.RequestImpl, allowing attackers to trigger a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-41947|2024-08-02T19:09:49.314Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20frugal%20testing%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Frugal Testing Plugin 1.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to Frugal Testing using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-24457|2024-08-02T10:56:04.162Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20keycloak%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Keycloak Authentication Plugin 2.3.0 and earlier allows attackers to trick users into logging in to the attacker's account.

item.title: CVE-2023-37942|2024-08-02T17:23:27.815Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20external%20monitor%20job%20type%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins External Monitor Job Type Plugin 206.v9a_94ff0b_4a_10 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-41946|2024-08-02T19:09:49.381Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20frugal%20testing%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Frugal Testing Plugin 1.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to Frugal Testing using attacker-specified credentials, and to retrieve test IDs and names from Frugal Testing, if a valid credential corresponds to the attacker-specified username.

item.title: CVE-2023-24426|2024-08-02T10:56:04.042Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20ad%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Azure AD Plugin 303.va_91ef20ee49f and earlier does not invalidate the previous session on login.

item.title: CVE-2023-37954|2024-08-02T17:23:27.830Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rebuilder%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Rebuilder Plugin 320.v5a_0933a_e7d61 and earlier allows attackers to rebuild a previous build.

item.title: CVE-2023-37957|2024-08-02T17:23:27.885Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20restful%20api%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline restFul API Plugin 0.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL, capturing a newly generated JCLI token.

item.title: CVE-2023-43496|2024-08-02T19:44:42.819Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.423 and earlier, LTS 2.414.1 and earlier creates a temporary file in the system temporary directory with the default permissions for newly created files when installing a plugin from a URL, potentially allowing attackers with access to the system temporary directory to replace the file before it is installed in Jenkins, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-27898|2024-08-02T12:23:30.482Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.270 through 2.393 (both inclusive), LTS 2.277.1 through 2.375.3 (both inclusive) does not escape the Jenkins version a plugin depends on when rendering the error message stating its incompatibility with the current version of Jenkins, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to provide plugins to the configured update sites and have this message shown by Jenkins instances.

item.title: CVE-2023-32977|2024-08-02T15:32:46.593Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20job%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Job Plugin does not escape the display name of the build that caused an earlier build to be aborted, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to set build display names immediately.

item.title: CVE-2023-43500|2024-08-02T19:44:42.731Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 2.4.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified hostname and port using attacker-specified username and password.

item.title: CVE-2023-35141|2024-08-02T16:23:59.560Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: In Jenkins 2.399 and earlier, LTS 2.387.3 and earlier, POST requests are sent in order to load the list of context actions. If part of the URL includes insufficiently escaped user-provided values, a victim may be tricked into sending a POST request to an unexpected endpoint by opening a context menu.

item.title: CVE-2023-40349|2024-08-02T18:31:53.589Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gogs%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Gogs Plugin 1.0.15 and earlier improperly initializes an option to secure its webhook endpoint, allowing unauthenticated attackers to trigger builds of jobs.

item.title: CVE-2023-40339|2024-08-02T18:31:53.808Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20config%20file%20provider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Config File Provider Plugin 952.va_544a_6234b_46 and earlier does not mask (i.e., replace with asterisks) credentials specified in configuration files when they're written to the build log.

item.title: CVE-2023-25768|2024-08-02T11:32:12.434Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Azure Credentials Plugin 253.v887e0f9e898b and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified web server.

item.title: CVE-2023-40346|2024-08-02T18:31:53.685Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20shortcut%20job%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Shortcut Job Plugin 0.4 and earlier does not escape the shortcut redirection URL, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure shortcut jobs.

item.title: CVE-2023-30514|2024-08-02T14:28:51.450Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20key%20vault%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Azure Key Vault Plugin 187.va_cd5fecd198a_ and earlier does not properly mask (i.e., replace with asterisks) credentials in the build log when push mode for durable task logging is enabled.

item.title: CVE-2023-37950|2024-08-02T17:23:27.823Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mabl%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins mabl Plugin 0.0.46 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-28673|2024-08-02T13:43:23.657Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20octoperf%20load%20testing%20plugin%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins OctoPerf Load Testing Plugin Plugin 4.5.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-37959|2024-08-02T17:23:27.887Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sumologic%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Sumologic Publisher Plugin 2.2.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2023-30513|2024-08-02T14:28:51.235Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kubernetes%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Kubernetes Plugin 3909.v1f2c633e8590 and earlier does not properly mask (i.e., replace with asterisks) credentials in the build log when push mode for durable task logging is enabled.

item.title: CVE-2023-24446|2024-08-02T10:56:04.167Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins OpenID Plugin 2.4 and earlier allows attackers to trick users into logging in to the attacker's account.

item.title: CVE-2023-24445|2024-08-02T10:56:03.985Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenID Plugin 2.4 and earlier improperly determines that a redirect URL after login is legitimately pointing to Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-25764|2024-08-02T11:32:12.218Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20email%20extension%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Email Extension Plugin 2.93 and earlier does not escape, sanitize, or sandbox rendered email template output or log output generated during template rendering, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to create or change custom email templates.

item.title: CVE-2023-35147|2024-08-02T16:23:59.318Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aws%20codecommit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AWS CodeCommit Trigger Plugin 3.0.12 and earlier does not restrict the AWS SQS queue name path parameter in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Item/Read permission to obtain the contents of arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2023-28682|2024-08-02T13:43:23.672Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20performance%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Performance Publisher Plugin 8.09 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-37952|2024-08-02T17:23:27.834Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mabl%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins mabl Plugin 0.0.46 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-37946|2024-08-02T17:23:27.795Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openshift%20login%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenShift Login Plugin 1.1.0.227.v27e08dfb_1a_20 and earlier does not invalidate the previous session on login.

item.title: CVE-2023-40343|2024-08-02T18:31:53.571Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20tuleap%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Tuleap Authentication Plugin 1.1.20 and earlier uses a non-constant time comparison function when validating an authentication token allowing attackers to use statistical methods to obtain a valid authentication token.

item.title: CVE-2023-24424|2024-08-02T10:56:03.791Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20connect%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin 2.4 and earlier does not invalidate the previous session on login.

item.title: CVE-2023-30520|2024-08-02T14:28:51.512Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20quay.io%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Quay.io trigger Plugin 0.1 and earlier does not limit URL schemes for repository homepage URLs submitted via Quay.io trigger webhooks, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to submit crafted Quay.io trigger webhook payloads.

item.title: CVE-2023-24433|2024-08-02T10:56:04.076Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20orka%20by%20macstadium%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Orka by MacStadium Plugin 1.31 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-41933|2024-08-02T19:09:49.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20configuration%20history%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin 1227.v7a_79fc4dc01f and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-40342|2024-08-02T18:31:53.581Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20flaky%20test%20handler%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Flaky Test Handler Plugin 1.2.2 and earlier does not escape JUnit test contents when showing them on the Jenkins UI, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to control JUnit report file contents.

item.title: CVE-2023-37958|2024-08-02T17:23:27.820Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sumologic%20publisher%20plugin

item.description: Jenkins OctoPerf Load Testing Plugin Plugin 4.5.1 and earlier does not perform a permission check in a connection test HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.description: Jenkins Azure AD Plugin 396.v86ce29279947 and earlier, except 378.380.v545b_1154b_3fb_, uses a non-constant time comparison function when checking whether the provided and expected CSRF protection nonce are equal, potentially allowing attackers to use statistical methods to obtain a valid nonce.

item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins TestQuality Updater Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified username and password.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T18:32:51.005Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-03-06T17:01:59.358Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28161|2024-06-04T18:04:02.925Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1, a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections is disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28160|2024-06-04T18:03:57.423Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20icescrum%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins iceScrum Plugin 1.1.6 and earlier does not sanitize iceScrum project URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28156|2024-06-04T18:03:53.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20monitor%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Monitor View Plugin 1.14-860.vd06ef2568b_3f and earlier does not escape Build Monitor View names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure Build Monitor Views.

item.title: CVE-2024-28151|2024-06-04T18:03:47.410Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

item.title: CVE-2024-28150|2024-06-04T18:03:41.778Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not escape job names, report names, and index page titles shown as part of the report frame, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-28149|2024-06-04T18:03:30.882Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.16 through 1.32 (both inclusive) does not properly sanitize input, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to implement cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists.

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-06-04T18:03:26.345Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-03-06T17:01:56.184Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-28155|2024-06-04T18:03:13.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.16 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain information about available scan config names, engine group names, and client names.

item.title: CVE-2024-28159|2024-03-06T17:02:00.731Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28158|2024-03-06T17:01:59.995Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28162|2024-06-04T18:03:09.469Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1 through 3.1.0 (both inclusive) a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections fails to take effect until Jenkins is restarted when switching from disabled validation to enabled validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-28154|2024-06-04T18:03:06.484Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mq%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins MQ Notifier Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier logs potentially sensitive build parameters as part of debug information in build logs by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-05-24T13:46:09.897Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-06-06T18:23:11.386Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-06-04T17:42:07.420Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-06-06T18:23:32.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-06-04T17:41:47.091Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-06-04T17:41:24.679Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-03-06T17:01:52.007Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2216|2024-03-06T17:01:52.616Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in an HTTP endpoint in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-06-26T17:06:26.399Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T17:06:27.695Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.
